directions: Remove gel dessert from plastic cup and place into a microwave-safe bowl; mash with a fork. Heat in microwave on low in 10-second intervals until melted, mashing each time with fork, 1 to 2 minutes. Stir peach schnapps into melted gel. Pour into shot cup and refrigerate until set, at least 30 minutes.
ingredients: 1  orange-flavored gel dessert snack (such as Snack Pack Juicy Gels®)
title: Jenny's Amazing Vegan/Vegetarian 'Jello' Shots
